text: Abayahudi kandi baravuze bati “Abanaswara nta shingiro bafite (ntibari mu idini ry’ukuri)”, n’Abanaswara baravuga bati “Abayahudi nta shingiro bafite (ntibari mu idini ry’ukuri)”; nyamara bose basoma igitabo (Tawurati n’Ivanjili). Iyo ni na yo mvugo abatabizi (ababangikanyamana b’Abarabu) bavuze. Allah ni we uzabakiranura ku munsi w’izuka mu byo batumvikanagaho
